summary: At the invitation of an estranged relative, a young woman travels with her niece and nephew to a castle in Europe for Christmas, where she unwittingly falls for a dashing Prince.
cast: Katie McGrath|Roger Moore|Sam Heughan|Travis Turner|Leilah de Meza|Miles Richardson|Charlotte Salt|Razvan Oprea|Oxana Moravec|Alan O'Silva|Madalina Anea|Razvan Ciuraru|Olivia Krevoy|Tristam Thomas|Maria Junghetu|Florin Busuioc|Marioara Sterian|Tamara Popescu|Matei Colteanu|Susie Belzberg|Constantin Florescu|Cathrin Chabrouni|Letitia Rosculet|Alexa Mogosdan|Alex Purje|Lucian Arbanasu|Matilda Dobrin|Ramona Dobrin|Anca Varlan|Iovu Costel|Michael Damian|Christina 'Kiki' Tholstrup
title: La princesa de Castlebury Hall
